goal.en: The main goal of this course is to provide students with a set of tools and knowledge that would enable them to critically read recent research papers and conduct their own original research in industrial organization. We will develop rigorous theoretical models maintaining their close connections to reality, elaborate on the economic logic and intuition behind the analyses, and discuss real-world implications.
goal.ch: 本課程將介紹如何應用產業組織的技巧來建構模型以研究資訊產業在各種競爭策略底下的發展。課程內容將深入地探討如何應用定價、差異化、外包、契約、供應鏈整合、廣告、存量管理、協商等策略來分析網路技術、電子商務、與物聯網底下的各種新興商業模式發展，且藉由閱讀Wall Street Journal案例來鏈結課程內容。

content.en:
Topics of interest for the special issue include, but not, limited to the following:
Pricing
Advertising
Versioning
Capacity Constraint
Network Effect
Two-sided Market
Economics of Live Streaming
Content Farm
P2P Lending
content.ch:
上課內容包含下面主題,但隨進度與產業動態調整:
定價
廣告
服務分流
產能限制
網路效應
雙邊平台
直播經濟
內容農場
P2P借貸
